1.content: How do you end up in the presence of Ms. Margot Robbie
1.title: How do you come across her

13.content:
You were a kid extra for Once Upon a Time in Hollywood and while you didn't have any interaction with Margot, your mind went haywire thinking of ways to get near her. The bell rang and you knew you had to be present in a scene. It was a dark theatre and all you knew what was that Margot was gonna watch a film in this scene.

You nearly had a heart attack when you looked over your shoulder and there was Margot's dirty feet just propped up for you to enjoy. For a minute straight, you had yourself looking at them and eventually you realized what was happening. You look at her and she swallows a laugh and looks away, probably feeling second hand embarrassment.

The director yells cut and everyone disperses doing their own thing. As you try keeping some distance between Margot and yourself, some assistant stops you and hands you Margot's white boots she wore for the scene. They tell you to not lose it and make sure it gets to Margots trailer immediately.

Your head is going dizzy, you can't believe whats in your hands. You run off to the trailer, theres no way you're gonna piss off Margot Robbie.

You make it to the front of her trailer and it looks pretty empty around you. Should you smell her boots or would it be wrong. You were faced with a what if then blew all caution to the wind.

You buried your face deep in those boots and the smell had you intoxicated on her feet. It put a charm on you were nothing else mattered.

Suddenly the knob of her trailer begins to wiggle and open. Its Margot Robbie and Margaret Qualley with a look of shock and laughter on their face.

You look up and freeze up, you were caught red headed and you didn't know what to do.

"Looks like you have something of mine little man... any explanation for what you're doing" Margot asks quizzically

"It looks to me that we have a little foot pervert in our midst" Margaret says cracking her long toes against the floor.

Margaret grabs your face with her big hands and it envelopes it into darkness. You were small and underdeveloped, only about 5'4 and relatively skinny.

"Now buster, no need for explanations... we're use to people like you just doing what they want. Now kneel" Margaret said ticked off.

You knelt in front of these goddesses, both of which sat on the couch in the trailer. Margot hooks one foot behind your head and the other gets planted on your face. The warmth of her foot felt heavenly and you inhaled deeply.

Margot began to wipe her dirty foot along your face, she hadn't cleaned it since the theatre scene. You extend your tongue out and start licking her soles clean. Margot switches feet and the process repeats.

As you humiliate yourself, you overhear them talking saying this was the freak who kept staring at my feet and the dirty boot sniffer.

This excited your body even more, hearing them talk down about you. Margot moves her feet around, squeezing your nipples, nose, and whatever else she could snag. You moan and they both burst into laughter.

Margot slaps your face with her foot and it moved your eyes into Margarets eyesight. She had this look of craziness and domination which both exited and scared you.

She grins and you assume she wants some service too. With your hands you continue to massage Margots feet and calves while you begin to work on Margarets feet.

Margarets feet are even bigger and they cover your whole face. You give long licks and kisses along her sole. Margaret then deep throats you with her foot and you sit there criss cross apple sauce gagging on her large feet.

"Lay on your back boy... you outta learn a lesson that you can't just smell whoever's shoes you want" Margot says playfully

You assume the position and you become a carpet for these two. All the dirt and filth on their feet were being transferred to every part of your body. Margot rests both feet on your face but she leaves some room where your eyes are so that you can still see them.

Margaret is rubbing her soles over your body laughing and hits something hard. She peeks but doesn't say anything. She moves both feet there and starts massaging the fabric of your groin. You convulse from pleasure and Margot lightly begins trampling your face. They're so soft and you plant a kiss everytime her feet meets your face.

Your hard on is being stimulated so hard. Suddenly youre told to assume the prior position and you obey. Margaret has many toe skills and she eventually frees your penis from your shorts. She bites her lip and grips your stiffy with her toes.

Meanwhile Margot moves close to you and grabs your face. She starts slapping you and tells you, "Lick my hands clean and suck my fingers" You obey and clean them in complete obedience.

Your stiffy is about to blow and Margot returns her feet to your face. You press your face into them and grind your face into her dirty soles. You climax all over her soles and you have this look of being absolutely ravaged. These two really did a number to you.

Margaret grabs your face and kisses you on the lips... ,"Me and Margot are gonna go take a nap. I want you to clean our shoes while we sleep and when your finished you will resume your duties of worshipping our feet... sound good slave" she slaps your face and you run off to do your job.
